statements: SELECT username, last_login FROM user_authentication WHERE is_locked = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication WHERE is_locked = TRUE;
SELECT username FROM user_authentication ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_authentication WHERE is_locked = TRUE;
SELECT username, last_login FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE is_locked = TRUE ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication WHERE last_login >= '2023-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, username, last_login FROM user_authentication WHERE is_locked = FALSE AND username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_locked_users FROM user_authentication WHERE is_locked = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, created_at FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT data_id, user_id, account_number, balance FROM financial_data WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT data_id, user_id, last_updated FROM financial_data ORDER BY last_updated;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 'c6b72f95-6469-4bca-b670-d4e99b03f501';
SELECT username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM financial_data WHERE balance > 10000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT users.username, financial_data.balance FROM users JOIN financial_data ON users.user_id = financial_data.user_id WHERE financial_data.balance < 5000;
SELECT users.username, financial_data.balance FROM users JOIN financial_data ON users.user_id = financial_data.user_id WHERE users.username LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY financial_data.balance;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, password_digest FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, login_timestamp FROM login_attempts ORDER BY login_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, account_balance FROM users JOIN financial_data ON users.user_id = financial_data.user_id WHERE users.username LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT users.username, MAX(account_balance) AS max_balance FROM users JOIN financial_data ON users.user_id = financial_data.user_id GROUP BY users.username HAVING max_balance > 10000;
SELECT users.username, COUNT(attempt_id) AS login_attempts_count FROM users JOIN login_attempts ON users.user_id = login_attempts.user_id GROUP BY users.username ORDER BY login_attempts_count DESC;
SELECT users.username, AVG(account_balance) AS avg_balance FROM users JOIN financial_data ON users.user_id = financial_data.user_id GROUP BY users.username HAVING avg_balance < 5000;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE expiration_time > NOW();
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE action LIKE '%login%';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01' AND username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT users.username, access_logs.timestamp FROM users JOIN access_logs ON users.id = access_logs.user_id WHERE access_logs.timestamp < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY access_logs.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT users.username, failed_logins.attempt_time FROM users LEFT JOIN failed_logins ON users.username = failed_logins.username ORDER BY failed_logins.attempt_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT users.username, sessions.expiration_time FROM users JOIN sessions ON users.id = sessions.user_id WHERE sessions.expiration_time > now() ORDER BY sessions.expiration_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT token, expiration_time FROM user_sessions WHERE expiration_time > NOW();
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_role_mapping INNER JOIN user_roles ON user_role_mapping.role_id = user_roles.role_id WHERE user_roles.role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, created_at FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM user_role_mapping GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles JOIN user_role_mapping ON user_roles.role_id = user_role_mapping.role_id;
SELECT user_id, MAX(change_time) AS last_password_change FROM password_history GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY last_password_change DESC;
